title: Sleeping Mobs – The Prince Wakes You Up if You’re a Princess, But What About the Mobs? - Novel Updates
tags: Curses   Doting Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Mob Protagonist   R-18   Royalty   Short Story   Witches
author: Noha   のは
description:
Well, mobs.

It's been three years since I fell asleep after being caught by the curse of a witch, and during that time, there are dozens of princes who passed through me. That's a good number!

If I were a princess, in this time I think at least one of them would have woken me up.
But the princess nicely avoided the curse because of me!

After three years it was a surprisingly beautiful prince who woke me up. In addition, it seems that the princess was aiming for this prince.
Well, mobs and princesses can't compete.

――or so I thought, but it wasn't like that !?
The prince is very kind to me, but I don't want that!>
